===Etymology===
[[ateji|Ateji]] for {{l|ja|コーヒー}}. Ultimately from {{etyl|nl|ja|sort=こおひい}} {{m|nl|koffie}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ko̞ːçiː]}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|コーヒー}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|コーヒー}}

# [[coffee]]

====Usage notes====
{{l|ja|コーヒー}} is much more common generally, but {{lang|ja|珈琲}} is found relatively frequently on signs for restaurants and on some menus.
